channel.title: Donators?
channel.description: Hey I've seen donating options on other RSPS forums, so I was wondering why MoparScape have one. The people that donate have a rank called "Donator" or "VIP". Any answers?

item.title: Donators?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I asked the same question years ago when MITB first added sponsored servers (see - Phazes’ quote) and I was satisfied with his answers (and he proved them later by paying blakeman)

Read full topic

item.title: Donators?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Rash:

MITB isn’t operating this website for profit.

As it should be. Communities shouldn’t be built by people with the most money.

Donating shouldn’t be something you get rewarded for. For example, just because you donate doesn’t mean you deserve any special privileges over any other member. This is why when I finish my framework, there will be no “donator” items or “donator” shops. Everyone is equal. If you want to donate to help with the cost of the VPS, or any other services that may be required, that’s fine. But don’t expect a cookie for it.

Read full topic

item.title: Donators?
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

Ok thanks guys, just wondering.

Read full topic

item.title: Donators?
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

Sponsored servers and status page

I am not, and have never attempted to scam anyone. Don’t you think I could have taken donations all of these years? Or even accepted money for people to ‘affiliate’ with me or advertise on the forums? (I can’t even count the number of times I have been asked) I also could make a LOT of money if I put more ads on here in different places, or pop ups, or pornographic advertisements. If I was in this for the money I would have more than 1 google ad at the top and bottom of the forum, which pay for the hosting costs each month, with no measures to stop you from blocking them with adblock or anything else, and I am kind of insulted that you think otherwise of me. Also there are countless forums that sell awards, status, or ‘donater’ ranks on forums, and I have never and will never do this because I hate those forums.

etc

Read full topic
